description: Create master inventory of all tools, commands, workflows, and scripts across coderef ecosystem
agent_instructions: ORCHESTRATOR ONLY: READ instructions.json at path above for complete task details

orchestrator.role: Creates master resource index from reference site, then synthesizes all agent inventories into unified ecosystem-wide master list

phase_2_instructions: After orchestrator completes phase 1, agents use agent-communication.json for their inventory tasks
phase_3_instructions: After all agents complete, orchestrator synthesizes final master list
